descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Sorry, my Google English.[/size]

[size=4][b][color=orange]Update Info/2014/02/10[/color][/b][/size]
[size=4]1.Fix
Ulfberth
He supports only 2 hours in the early morning.
I forgot his services because customer is not coming.
Sorry, sorry!

2.Added
Lydia
He eats in the Great Porch lunch and Dragonsreach dinner.
Eating is an very very important work...., for him.
What? ....Did you say something?

Sinmir
He patrols for Whiterun. You can see his brave figure on top of the Guard Barracks.[/size]


[size=4][b][color=orange]Description[/color][/b][/size]
[size=4]Wandering wandering wandering...., always unsteadily wandering.

Drinking, drinking, drinking...., always unhealthy drinking.

Every day, every day, every day.

So fxxking lazy men.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Amren - He works at Pelagia Farm.

Brenuin - He apprenticed to Eorlund Gray-Mane.

Idolaf Battle-Born and Jon Battle-Born - They work at Battle-Born Farm.

Nazeem - He works at Chillfurrow Farm.

Ulfberth War-Bear - He supports his wife in the early morning.

Lydia - He eats in the Great Porch lunch and Dragonsreach dinner.

Sinmir - He patrols for Whiterun.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I made ​​a video(Yes! No pop-up ads!).
Maybe, you'll understand their laziness.[/size]

[size=4][b][color=orange]Install and Uninstall[/color][/b][/size]
[size=4]Please use NMM or other Mod tool.[/size]

[size=4][b][color=orange]Credits[/color][/b][/size]
[size=4]Thanks to BETHESDA and CreationKit.
Thank you for Nexus, and all people.[/size]
author: Tokonatuduki
